title: Still haven't been unbanned due to chargeback
body:
Hey Wuks,

You told me to contact you I have I not been unbanned within 5 days of the chargeback billing ticket and it has approximatly been that, so could you please look into the details of my accounts suspension and the chargeback as I have spent over 600 dollars on this account and this is another 100 dollars going to waste as my account has not been unabnned yet. Thank you for your time.

-Defiler
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Hey 20stack Defiler,

Wuks is a volunteer from the community not a Rioter, so he can't personally look into it for you. They had a large ban wave for cheaters recently so the fraud department might be going through lots of support tickets right now. Just hang on and try to be patient; they *will* get to your ticket, it just may take some more time. If you're waiting on a response to your ticket make sure not to post comments in it or it will be bumped to the back of the queue again.

Thanks, DTN.
https://i.gyazo.com/a1b3153b844387ef52d2ac08b68abe10.png
Do you have a ticket number for your request? I'll double check to make sure that there aren't any issues.
Awesome and no problem! I'm just happy to hear that it's been sorted out.
